channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 6 Tax Deadlines Business Owners Need to Know for 2026—and 1 for 2027
item.description: Here are the key tax filing dates for businesses and self-employed individuals in 2026.

item.title: ‘Parasocial’ named Cambridge’s 2025 word of the year

item.title: ‘Santa Rally’ stalls even though a December cut from the Fed is a near certainty
item.description: Unfortunately, the tech sector is spoiling the party: Bitcoin sank to $85K early this morning.

item.title: TikTok’s Viral ‘Bird Test’ for Relationships Works at the Office Too
item.description: The science behind the viral ‘bird test’ applies just as much to professional relationships as romantic ones.

item.title: Corporations Say They Prioritize People. So Why Do So Few Chief People Officers Become CEOs?
item.description: Only 16 of the CEOs at the 1,000 biggest companies have HR experience. Experts say that’s a miss.
